author: Gretchen Hydo
title: MedSys Group Ranks for 3rd Consecutive Year on Modern Healthcare’s 'Best Places to Work in Healthcare List'
text:
MedSys Group announced today its ranking on Modern Healthcare’s Best Places to Work in Healthcare list. The Best Places to Work in Healthcare award recognizes employers for their outstanding performance in economic development, employee retention and satisfaction. For the third consecutive year, MedSys Group is one of the top 100 healthcare companies across the nation to earn this prestigious award. In the entire state of Texas, MedSys Group is one of eleven companies to be recognized. MedSys ranked 75 out of 100 for the Best Places to Work in Healthcare and 40 out of 100 in the supplier category.
“We are honored to be recognized by Modern Healthcare as one of the best places to work in healthcare, for the third year in a row,” Alan Kravitz, CEO & Founder of MedSys Group said. “We truly believe that there is no MedSys without our employees, consultants, and clients working together in unison. We pride ourselves on delivering excellence as a nationally recognized healthcare IT delivery organization.”
MedSys Group , a healthcare IT services firm, was rated by its employees in eight core areas including benefits, pay, role satisfaction, leadership, and culture. The company’s core values of communication, trust, honesty, respect, and commitment help them to carry out their mission of enabling the evolution of healthcare™. MedSys partners with its clients, while offering world-class leadership, resources, methodologies and insights.
The ranking of the winning companies was announced at a gala held in Nashville, Tennessee on October 14, 2015. To see a full list of the Modern Healthcare Best Places to Work in Healthcare winners by rank, please visit: Modern Healthcare Best Places to Work in Healthcare 2015 .
About MedSys Group®, LLC:
Founded in 2008, MedSys Group® LLC, is a healthcare IT services firm, delivering outstanding services and results to academic medical centers, integrated delivery networks, specialty hospitals, and physician practices. MedSys provides expert leadership in Cerner, Epic and other acute/ambulatory, EHR and revenue cycle systems. MedSys is frequently featured in A-list publications and was named for two consecutive years on the Dallas 100 list of fastest growing companies in North Texas. MedSys is the recipient of Modern Healthcare’s Best Places to Work in Healthcare and the Inc. 5000 awards. For more information please visit: http://www.MedSysGroup.com or call 972-464-0020. You can also follow the company on Twitter @MedSysGroup. For interviews or media inquiries, please contact Gretchen Hydo, Director of Public Relations, at Gretchen(at)Chatterboxink.com.
